languages.text: {n}На устах второй застыла улыбка, одновременно глумливая и болезненная. Она, как и первая, будто не может согнать ее с лица.{/n} "Ты испорчена, потому Неумирающий не забирает тебя. Теперь ты — добыча нечестивцев, их игрушка".

{n}The other wears a smile, both mocking and pained at once. Like the first figure, this one seems unable to rid itself of its expression.{/n} "You are ruined. That is why the Undying One refuses to take you away. Now you are prey for the wicked, their plaything."
languages.original_text: {n}На устах второй застыла улыбка, одновременно глумливая и болезненная. Она, как и первая, будто не может согнать ее с лица.{/n} "Ты испорчена, потому Неумирающий не забирает тебя. Теперь ты — добыча нечестивцев, их игрушка".

traits.locale_text: {n}The other wears a smile, both mocking and pained at once. Like the first figure, this one seems unable to rid itself of its expression.{/n} "You are ruined. That is why the Undying One refuses to take you away. Now you are prey for the wicked, their plaything."
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion_Ch03_NPC_Alienation

languages.text: {n}La otra figura sonríe con burla y dolor al mismo tiempo. Al igual que la primera figura, parece incapaz de mostrar otra expresión.{/n} «Es su fin. Por eso el Inmortal se niega a llevarle. Ahora es presa de los espantos, prácticamente un juguete».
languages.original_text: {n}The other wears a smile, both mocking and pained at once. Like the first figure, this one seems unable to rid itself of its expression.{/n} "You are ruined. That is why the Undying One refuses to take you away. Now you are prey for the wicked, their plaything."

traits.locale_text: {n}La otra figura sonríe con burla y dolor al mismo tiempo. Al igual que la primera figura, parece incapaz de mostrar otra expresión.{/n} «Es su fin. Por eso el Inmortal se niega a llevarle. Ahora es presa de los espantos, prácticamente un juguete».
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion_Ch03_NPC_Alienation

languages.text: {n}もう1人は、小馬鹿にしたような苦しそうな笑みを浮かべている。最初の人物と同じく、こちらもその表情を崩すことができないようだ。{/n}「お前はお終いよ。だから不死の者のお迎えが来ないの。今やお前は悪魔達にもてあそばれる獲物になってしまった」
languages.original_text: {n}The other wears a smile, both mocking and pained at once. Like the first figure, this one seems unable to rid itself of its expression.{/n} "You are ruined. That is why the Undying One refuses to take you away. Now you are prey for the wicked, their plaything."

traits.locale_text: {n}もう1人は、小馬鹿にしたような苦しそうな笑みを浮かべている。最初の人物と同じく、こちらもその表情を崩すことができないようだ。{/n}「お前はお終いよ。だから不死の者のお迎えが来ないの。今やお前は悪魔達にもてあそばれる獲物になってしまった」
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion_Ch03_NPC_Alienation

languages.text: {n}另一个绮贝菈面带微笑，但笑容充满了嘲讽与痛苦的意味。与之前的绮贝菈相似，这个绮贝菈的表情也仿佛面具一样固定在了脸上。{/n}“你已经被毁了，所以不死之神才不肯将你带走。如今的你，已经成为了邪恶之人的猎物，沦为了他们的玩物。”
languages.original_text: {n}The other wears a smile, both mocking and pained at once. Like the first figure, this one seems unable to rid itself of its expression.{/n} "You are ruined. That is why the Undying One refuses to take you away. Now you are prey for the wicked, their plaything."

traits.locale_text: {n}另一个绮贝菈面带微笑，但笑容充满了嘲讽与痛苦的意味。与之前的绮贝菈相似，这个绮贝菈的表情也仿佛面具一样固定在了脸上。{/n}“你已经被毁了，所以不死之神才不肯将你带走。如今的你，已经成为了邪恶之人的猎物，沦为了他们的玩物。”
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion_Ch03_NPC_Alienation

languages.text: {n}Die andere Gestalt lächelt gleichermaßen spöttisch wie gequält. Wie die erste scheint auch sie ihren Gesichtsausdruck nicht ändern zu können.{/n} "Ihr seid zerstört. Deshalb weigert sich der Todlose, Euch zu holen. Ihr seid nun eine Beute für die Ungläubigen, ihr Spielzeug."
languages.original_text: {n}The other wears a smile, both mocking and pained at once. Like the first figure, this one seems unable to rid itself of its expression.{/n} "You are ruined. That is why the Undying One refuses to take you away. Now you are prey for the wicked, their plaything."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die andere Gestalt lächelt gleichermaßen spöttisch wie gequält. Wie die erste scheint auch sie ihren Gesichtsausdruck nicht ändern zu können.{/n} "Ihr seid zerstört. Deshalb weigert sich der Todlose, Euch zu holen. Ihr seid nun eine Beute für die Ungläubigen, ihr Spielzeug."
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion_Ch03_NPC_Alienation

languages.text: {n}L'autre affiche un sourire tout à la fois moqueur et affligé. À l'instar de la première silhouette, celle-ci semble incapable de se défaire de cette expression plaquée sur ses traits.{/n} « Tu ne vaux plus rien. Voilà pourquoi l'Immortel ne veut pas de toi. Désormais, tu es une proie pour les forces du mal, un jouet qu'elles manipulent à loisir. »
languages.original_text: {n}The other wears a smile, both mocking and pained at once. Like the first figure, this one seems unable to rid itself of its expression.{/n} "You are ruined. That is why the Undying One refuses to take you away. Now you are prey for the wicked, their plaything."

À l'instar de la première silhouette, celle-ci semble incapable de se défaire de cette expression plaquée sur ses traits.{/n} « Tu ne vaux plus rien. Voilà pourquoi l'Immortel ne veut pas de toi. Désormais, tu es une proie pour les forces du mal, un jouet qu'elles manipulent à loisir. »
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion_Ch03_NPC_Alienation

languages.text: {n}Diğeri ise aynı anda hem alaycı hem de acılı bir edayla gülümsüyor. İlkinin aksine bu suret, yüz ifadesini istese de değiştiremez gibi görünüyor.{/n} "Sen paramparçasın. Ölmeyen bu yüzden seni almayı reddediyor. Artık kötülükler için bir avsın, onların oyuncağısın."
languages.original_text: {n}The other wears a smile, both mocking and pained at once. Like the first figure, this one seems unable to rid itself of its expression.{/n} "You are ruined. That is why the Undying One refuses to take you away. Now you are prey for the wicked, their plaything."
